original: induction v using vec_nat_induction. - reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite vec_map_list_plus, IHv. f_equal. + apply vec_pos_ext. intro p. destruct (pos_S_inv p) as [Hp|Hp]; subst. * rewrite vec_map_list_one, vec_map_list_one. reflexivity. * rewrite !vec_map_list_one. reflexivity. + apply map_ext_Forall. intros p. apply map_ext_Forall. intros q. apply vec_change_eq. apply pos_nxt_inj.
